eu.wauz.wauzcore.menu.util

Interface WauzInventory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AchievementsMenu, AchievementsMenuPage, ArrowMenu, Backpack, BestiaryMenu, BreedingMenu, CharacterClassMenu, CharacterSlotMenu, CitizenInteractionMenu, CraftingMenu, CurrencyMenu, FriendsMenu, GroupMenu, GuildApplicationMenu, GuildOverviewMenu, LootContainer, MailMenu, MaterialPouch, QuestMenu, QuestRewardChooser, ShopMenu, SkillAssignMenu, SkillMenu, TabardBuilder, TabardMenu, TitleMenu, TradeMenu, TravellingMenu, WauzDialog, WauzMenu, WauzModeMenu

    public interface WauzInventory
    An inventory that can be used as menu or for other custom interaction mechanics.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void destroyInventory(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryCloseEvent event)
      Cleans up everything, so the inventory can be closed.

      default void openInstance(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Opens a new inventory of this type for the given player.
      void selectMenuPoint(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event)
      Checks if an event in this inventory was triggered by a player click.

    • Method Detail

      • getInventoryId

        java.lang.String getInventoryId()
        Returns:
        The id of the inventory.

      • getGamemodes

        default java.util.List<WauzMode> getGamemodes()
        Returns:
        The modes in which the inventory can be opened.

      • openInstance

        default void openInstance(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Opens a new inventory of this type for the given player.
        Parameters:

        Checks if an event in this inventory was triggered by a player click.

      • destroyInventory

        default void destroyInventory(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryCloseEvent event)
